title: Champion doesn't move
body:
I've been playing league of legends for few days now at the first day it was all good but now I can't move my champion!
Everything else works the only problem is that i can't move my champion! 

I also reinstalled the game but it didn't help

replies.body:
This likely due to network instability. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
But i' playing with the same internet speed!
Your connection to the servers is likely being interrupted which is leading to your champion being unable to move.

Oh i see
so is there a way i can fix it?

*Rineyy* linked a guide in their first post to offer the most common solutions for the issue you're seeing. In case you're having trouble accessing the link, try clicking [HERE.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

When a connection is unstable, the server can have a hard time receiving you champion's actions or ability inputs, which are sent out to the server as *outbound packets*. If these packets drop off before reaching the server, your actions won't take place on the server, and you'll visually see this as your champ not responding to input.

If you still have issues after working through that guide, let me know.

Oh thanks i checked the link but it didn't help 
i don't think it's because of the connection!

It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

(Credits to Targons Blade for this)

If you continue to experience this after the clean reinstall;

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **My game gets stuck at champion select, loading screen, in-game, post-or end-game lobby**

The Hextech Repair Tool should have generated a set of logs, attach these in the ticket. If you are unable to locate the logs, the guide below will let you know how to obtain them.


https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg

[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide! ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
